recent-projects.title: vendx-slab module
recent-projects.description: In this module, the user was to provide some input range, and at least two slabs and a maximum of thirty could be added. and the beginning of the second slab must be 1 plus the ending of the previous slab. This entire slab was related to a specific item, and itmes were rendered in the table. Each item has its own slab.
recent-projects.technologies: ReactJS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Git,redux,material ui

recent-projects.title: vendx-authentication-workflow module
recent-projects.description: This is a webpack-created react package, and its build file is used in a standard cdn file. The APIs are maintained on the consumer side. The change in the package file is applied to the outside of the package by using state uplifitng and props drilling. Snack bar is in the package file and is triggered from the user side when any action is taken.
recent-projects.technologies: ReactJS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript,npm,webpack Git,material ui

recent-projects.title: Cloud-kida
recent-projects.description: Cloud Kida is a platform that provides users with a virtual lab in which to complete their tasks. There are three user roles in this app, and each user has their own roles-based data. As a result, protected routes are used for rendering user-base data.
recent-projects.technologies: ReactJS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Git,redux,material ui

experience: My experience as a Frontend Developer at Technotery allowed me to gain a deeper understanding of advanced front-end technologies. I have gained knowledge of React JS, Redux Thunk, JavaScript, and the elegant Material UI framework. My versatility also extended to the mobile domain, where I developed applications for both Android and iOS using React Native.

I am responsible for a variety of responsibilities, ranging from intricate form management to precise validation, to seamless integration of Axios APIs and adept management of API error codes. I gained a deeper understanding of frontend development, including React JS and React Native, as a result of these challenges.

In my work, collaboration is a key component. I collaborated closely with fellow developers on diverse projects, conducting comprehensive code reviews and skillfully resolving merge conflicts. Additionally, I took charge of project workflows, leveraging GitHub's comprehensive project management features, such as issues and pull requests
